name: Interface ThrowsTag
text:
Represents a @throws or @exception documentation tag.
 Parses and holds the exception name and exception comment.
 Note: @exception is a backwards compatible synonymy for @throws.
codes:
@Deprecated(since="9",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface ThrowsTag
extends Tag

methods.description:
Return the name of the exception
 associated with this ThrowsTag.

Return the exception comment
 associated with this ThrowsTag.

Return a ClassDoc that represents the exception.
 If the type of the exception is a type variable, return the
 ClassDoc of its erasure.

  This method cannot accommodate certain generic type
 constructs.  The exceptionType method
 should be used instead.

Return the type of the exception
 associated with this ThrowsTag.
 This may be a ClassDoc or a TypeVariable.
